panels.visual: A beautiful meadow of wildflowers. A large bear grazes peacefully in the distance. Whortheus approaches with scholarly curiosity, ignoring Armando's warning gestures.
Whortheus literally pokes the bear with his staff. The bear's eyes go wide with rage. This is the moment everything goes wrong.
panels.dialogue: Whortheus: "I just want to examine itsâ€”"

panels.visual: The bear mauls Whortheus viciously. Blood sprays across wildflowers. Armando screams in horror. Eurostras raises his hands, magical energy building.

Eurostras casts Thunderwave - a devastating blast of force. The bear flees in terror... but Whortheus lies motionless in the blast radius, killed by friendly fire. Eurostras stares at his hands in horror.
